name: Millet Almond Oat Cookies with Chocolate chips. Gluten-free Vegan Recipe
description: These almond oat cookies are so delicious!  Filled with chocolate chips and vegan and gluten free
recipeIngredient: 2 Tablespoon oil (I use 1 Tbsp each of organic canola and virgin coconut oil)
2 Tablespoons ground raw sugar (2.5 for sweeter)
1/4 cup pearl millet flour (or any gf flour)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add everything except the flours. Mix well for 2 minutes until well combined. Let sit for 2 minutes. Mix again for a few seconds.( to help the flax become gel-ish)
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add everything except the flours. Mix well for 2 minutes until well combined. Let sit for 2 minutes. Mix again for a few seconds.( to help the flax become gel-ish)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flours and mix using spoon or hand to a dry dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flours and mix using spoon or hand to a dry dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chocolate chips and mix to distribute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chocolate chips and mix to distribute.

recipeInstructions.text: Chill the dough for 15 minutes in the refrigerator.
recipeInstructions.name: Chill the dough for 15 minutes in the refrigerator.

recipeInstructions.text: Make flat balls and place on parchment lined baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Make flat balls and place on parchment lined baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F for 13-14 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F for 13-14 minutes.

keywords: easy cookie recipe, gluten free cookies, vegan cookies
